statements: SELECT device_id, device_name, data_value, timestamp FROM device_data;
SELECT * FROM device_data WHERE device_id = 100;
SELECT device_name, data_value FROM device_data WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT device_id, device_name FROM device_data WHERE data_value->>'temperature' <= '30';
SELECT * FROM device_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM device_data ORDER BY device_name DESC LIMIT 3
SELECT device_id, device_name, EXTRACT(DAY FROM timestamp) AS day FROM device_data WHERE device_name LIKE 'S%' ORDER BY timestamp
SELECT device_id, device_name, COUNT(*) AS total_count FROM device_data GROUP BY device_id, device_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1
SELECT device_name, AVG(data_value ->> 'temperature') AS avg_temperature FROM device_data WHERE data_value ->> 'temperature' IS NOT NULL GROUP BY device_name
SELECT device_name, COUNT(*) AS total_count FROM device_data WHERE device_name IN ('Device1', 'Device2', 'Device3') GROUP BY device_name ORDER BY total_count DESC
SELECT * FROM device_data WHERE device_id = 1;
SELECT device_name, data_type, timestamp FROM device_data WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM device_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT cloud_provider, data_type FROM cloud_data WHERE data_type = 'temperature';
SELECT cloud_id, cloud_provider, timestamp FROM cloud_data ORDER BY cloud_id ASC;
SELECT device_id, device_name FROM device_data WHERE data_type = 'temperature' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM cloud_data WHERE cloud_provider = 'AWS' ORDER BY cloud_id ASC
SELECT device_id, device_name, data_type, timestamp FROM device_data WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND timestamp <= '2022-12-31 23:59:59' ORDER BY device_id
SELECT cloud_id, cloud_provider, data_type, timestamp FROM cloud_data WHERE data_type IN ('humidity', 'pressure') ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM device_data WHERE device_name LIKE '%sensor%' ORDER BY device_id ASC
SELECT * FROM device_data;
SELECT device_id, device_name FROM device_data WHERE device_id = 100;
SELECT cloud_name, data_storage FROM cloud_data WHERE cloud_id = 200;
SELECT * FROM sync_logs WHERE action_type = 'SYNC' ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT device_name, data_payload->>'sensor_reading' AS sensor_reading FROM device_data WHERE device_id = 300;
SELECT device_id, device_name, data_payload FROM device_data WHERE device_id = 1;
SELECT cloud_name, data_storage FROM cloud_data WHERE cloud_id = 1;
SELECT device_id, device_name, data_payload FROM device_data ORDER BY device_id ASC;
SELECT log_id, action_type, log_message, created_at FROM sync_logs WHERE action_type = 'SYNC' ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT device_name, cloud_name, created_at FROM device_data JOIN cloud_data ON device_id = cloud_id;
SELECT * FROM connected_devices ORDER BY device_name DESC;
SELECT device_id, device_name, device_type FROM connected_devices WHERE device_type = 'Smartphone';
SELECT service_name, stored_data FROM cloud_services WHERE service_type = 'Storage';
SELECT data_id, device_id, service_id, data_content FROM device_data WHERE device_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT log_id, sync_timestamp FROM sync_logs ORDER BY sync_timestamp ASC;
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM connected_devices
SELECT service_name, service_type FROM cloud_services WHERE service_type = 'storage'
SELECT device_name, last_sync_timestamp FROM connected_devices ORDER BY last_sync_timestamp DESC
SELECT device_name, service_type, stored_data FROM connected_devices JOIN cloud_services ON connected_devices.device_id = cloud_services.service_id
SELECT device_name, service_name, sync_timestamp FROM connected_devices JOIN sync_logs ON connected_devices.device_id = sync_logs.device_id
SELECT * FROM connected_devices;
SELECT service_name, last_update FROM cloud_services;
SELECT device_id, device_name, last_sync FROM connected_devices WHERE device_id = 2;
SELECT log_id, sync_status, sync_timestamp FROM sync_logs ORDER BY sync_timestamp DESC;
SELECT error_id, error_message FROM sync_errors WHERE error_id > 10;
SELECT device_name, last_sync FROM connected_devices WHERE device_id = 1
SELECT service_name, last_update FROM cloud_services WHERE service_id = 2
SELECT device_name, last_sync FROM connected_devices WHERE last_sync > '2020-01-01'
SELECT service_name, last_update FROM cloud_services ORDER BY last_update DESC LIMIT 3
SELECT device_name, service_name, sync_status, sync_timestamp FROM connected_devices JOIN sync_logs ON connected_devices.device_id = sync_logs.device_id
